Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Waller
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via: Chicago, Central, Augusta, and Austin due to, street blockage near Chicago/Waller.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted  in both directions via: Chicago, Central, Augusta, and Austin due to, street blockage near Chicago/Waller.

Allow extra travel time.
